ProTech360 is built to ensure safety and well-being of people via location tracking. There are added features such as "Track Rooms" and "Meetings" for the convenience of the users. Apart from that, location-based reminders can also be set and the app contains a panic button for emergency situations.
This application is made by
Usman Rafi Syed Sajjad Ali Syeda Zainab Bukhari Zainab Saif
